Protocols/PercentDrivenInteractionContro.name: finish()
Protocols/PercentDrivenInteractionContro.abstract: Finishes the animation by completing it from the current progress onwards.

Protocols/TransitionAnimation.html#/s:12.name: start()
Protocols/TransitionAnimation.html#/s:12.abstract: Starts the animation by possibly creating a new interaction controller.

Protocols/TransitionAnimation.html#/s:12.name: cleanup()
